name: Stone Boy: Story of Zog
description:
What is a bored prehistoric teenager to do at night? Fire is burning, parents are asleep, no tigers lurking about ... it's time to bring out the newest fad, the Stone Boy!

The Stone Boy is the first-ever handheld gaming device. No more drawing on cave walls when you can have controlled animations in your hand. Preloaded with the bestselling game of all time (or only sold), The Story of Zog.

Take control of Zog, newly married and got a bow! Explore the dangerous surroundings and show the wife you love her by bringing her all the things she needs. Fire - check, berries - check, Mammoth tusk ... working on it. 

Find fire, do some fishing and recruit help from other tribesmen and hunt those big old animals to extinction. But watch out they are tough and not so happy to be shot at.

And that Sabre-tooth Tiger is still lurking somewhere.

Controls

WASD or arrows to move around
Space or left mouse click to shoot
I shows inventory
X marks a waypoint
Z shows your score

ESC to get out of here, but what will happen next?

An entry for Godot Wild Jam #42
